about.text: Hi, I'm Aleksandar, web developer from Belgrade, and I like to create interesting things. Don't hasitate to contact me if you have some project or cool idea, or if you want to hang out.

oldWebsite.text: I am very proud with my old website, but it was time to update him with some new style and updated stack. I still want to show my first website to others. Check it out and tell me what site do you think is better.
